content: Add enrich_from_extras method to UnifiedTypeInfo in unified_types.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after adding enrich_from_extras method
Remove DirectDiscovery variant from DiscoverySource enum in types.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt - expect compilation errors to guide remaining changes
Update enrich_with_extras in discovery_context.rs to use in-place mutation
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after updating enrich_with_extras
Update Level 2 filter in engine.rs to only check for RegistryPlusExtras
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after updating Level 2 filter
Remove from_discovery_response from unified_types.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after removing from_discovery_response
Remove merge_discovered_info from discovery_context.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after removing merge_discovered_info
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Update tests in tests.rs to use new enrich_from_extras method
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after updating tests
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
Run final cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any final clippy issues
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review (read-only) - focus on duplication, complexity, plan adherence
Review suggestions with user
